title: AI Engineer
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan AI Engineer PT Abhimantra Sistem Solusindo
Job Descriptions
Mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan model AI/ML untuk kebutuhan analisis data dan chatbot.
Menangani preprocessing data & deployment model ke production environment.
Mengoptimalkan kinerja model agar sesuai dengan kebutuhan bisnis dan pengguna akhir.
Job Requirements
Min. S1 Teknik Informatika / Data Science / terkait.
Memiliki sertifikasi BNSP atau sertifikasi resmi instansi pemerintahan terkait AI/ML.
Menguasai Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
Berpengalaman dalam NLP & integrasi model ke sistem produksi.
Bersedia bekerja sesuai kontrak jangka waktu proyek.

title: AI Engineer
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan AI Engineer Zando Agency
Kamu siap bangun masa depan bareng tim yang gesit, kreatif, dan haus inovasi? Kamu tipe yang excited lihat model performance naik, suka ngulik prompt sampe tengah malem, dan selalu penasaran gimana AI bisa nge-boost bisnis, maka Zando mau ketemu kamu!
Tanggung Jawab Utama
1. Menganalisis masalah bisnis yang kompleks dan mengubahnya menjadi permasalahan AI yang dapat diselesaikan secara teknis.
2. Mendesain, membangun, dan mengimplementasikan aplikasi AI end-to-end menggunakan framework modern seperti LangChain, LangGraph, dan berbagai platform orkestrasi AI.
3. Mengembangkan dan menyempurnakan Large Language Models (LLMs) serta mengoptimalkan performa melalui teknik prompt engineering untuk berbagai kebutuhan seperti otomatisasi proses, pembuatan konten, dan pengembangan kode.
Kualifikasi
1. Lulusan S1 atau lebih tinggi di bidang Ilmu Komputer, Matematika, Statistika, atau bidang teknis terkait.
2. Memiliki 3â€“5 tahun pengalaman di bidang AI, Machine Learning, atau Data Science.
3. Mahir dalam Python dan memiliki pengalaman dengan framework AI/ML seperti OpenAI APIs, LangChain, atau LangGraph.
4. Pengalaman dalam deploy aplikasi di platform cloud seperti AWS, GCP, atau Azure.
5. Pemahaman mendalam mengenai LLMs, orkestrasi AI, dan teknik prompt engineering.
6. 
Pernah membangun dan mengimplementasikan solusi AI end-to-end secara langsung
 (nilai plus)
7. 
Pengalaman dalam pengembangan front-end menggunakan framework seperti React atau Vue.js
 (nilai plus)
8. Siap bergabung secepatnya dan penempatan di PIK 1, Jakarta Utara

title: AI Engineer
location: Tanah Abang, Jakarta Pusat, DKI Jakarta
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan AI Engineer Maknadata
Company dedicated to scaling growth through strategic implementation of data analytics and artificial intelligence. With a focus on user adoption and impactful business outcomes, we help companies navigate the complexities of integrating advanced technologies into their operations. As the adoption of AI continues to evolve rapidly, we are at the forefront of addressing the challenges this transition presents, ensuring our clients achieve their growth objectives.
We are currently seeking an AI Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this pivotal role, you will play a crucial part in shaping the future of data-driven solutions. Our hybrid work environment offers the flexibility to balance remote and office-based collaboration, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous learning. This position is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment and is eager to contribute to groundbreaking projects.
Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop AI models that enhance operational efficiency and drive business growth.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure AI solutions meet user needs and deliver measurable outcomes.
- Implement machine learning algorithms and integrate them into existing systems.
- Conduct performance analysis and refine AI models for optimal results.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in AI and data science to continuously improve our offerings.
Qualifications:
- Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
- Between 1 to 3 years of experience in AI engineering or a closely related role.
- Proficiency in Redis, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence.
- Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for creating impactful AI solutions.
- Experience working in a hybrid work environment is a plus.
- A collaborative mindset and a commitment to excellence in delivering high-quality results.
Join us at Maknadata, where your expertise can make a significant difference in the way businesses leverage AI and data analytics. We offer a supportive environment that encourages professional growth and innovation, making this an exciting opportunity for an ambitious AI Engineer.

title: AI Engineer
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan AI Engineer Pt Boer Technology
Kualifikasi:
Pendidikan minimal D3 bidang teknik informatika, sistem informasi, ilmu komputer, teknologi informasi, statistika, matematika, teknik industri atau jurusan setara terkait bidang studi Information Technology.
Pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun di bidang data operation atau development.
Pengalaman dan menguasai dalam mengelola infrastruktur configuration (server & network), OS configuration (Linux & Windows servers), containerized ecosystem (Docker, Kubernetes).
Pengalaman dan menguasai dalam mengelola API berbasis GraphQL 
Pengalaman dan menguasai di level advanced / professional terkait platform database dan kubernetes. 
Menguasai query dan optimasi SQL & NOSQL (database cluster & non-cluster) 
Menguasai teknologi CI/CD seperti Jenkins dan Bamboo untuk mendukung proses deployment model dan aplikasi AI/ML
Menguasai teknologi automation seperti Ansible 
Menguasai configuration dan optimasi platform data berbasis containerized API (high availability dan clustering) 
Melakukan analisis data growth dan traffic service untuk memberikan suggestion terkait capacity planning dan management
Mampu menyusun dan mempresentasikan analisa, rekomendasi & insight terkait aplikasi berbasis containerized API secara keseluruhan kepada tim teknis dan bisnis atau non-teknis dalam bentuk presentasi, dokumen, atau reguler report 
Melakukan pengecekan di level detail object platform aplikasi berbasis containerized API untuk mengidentifikasi suatu atau potensi issue / problem. Memiliki kemampuan menentukan solusi permanen sebagai langkah solving issue maupun langkah perbaikan berkelanjutan 
Menguasai proses automasi (monitoring, alert, notification, analisis) terkait dengan platform berbasis containerized API 
Menguasai performance improvement dan tuning pada platform data berbasis web server, API, Tableau Server, 
Micosoft Reporting Service maupun server untuk memenuhi kebutuhan platform 
Menguasai tools yang digunakan untuk menjalankan daily operations seperti ELK Stack, Grafana, DB Monitoring, Confluence, JIRA

title: AI Engineer
location: Tanjung Priok, Jakarta Utara, DKI Jakarta
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan AI Engineer PT Midory Cipta Kreasi
OPEN RECRUITMENT FOR : AI ENGINEER
PT Midory Cipta Kreasi sedang mencari individu berbakat dan berdedikasi untuk bergabung dalam tim kami sebagai AI Engineer di divisi Computer Vision. Posisi ini memberikan kesempatan untuk bekerja di lingkungan yang inovatif, dinamis, dan kolaboratif, dengan proyek-proyek yang berkontribusi langsung pada perkembangan teknologi AI yang mutakhir.
Tanggung Jawab:
- Mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan model machine learning dan deep learning untuk aplikasi computer vision.
- Mengolah, membersihkan, dan menganalisis data gambar dan video guna mendukung pengembangan model.
- Berkolaborasi dengan tim lintas fungsi untuk memahami kebutuhan proyek dan memberikan solusi teknologi yang tepat.
- Melakukan penelitian dan eksperimen terhadap model-model baru serta metode peningkatan performa.
- Optimasi pipeline machine learning untuk efisiensi komputasi dan integrasi ke dalam sistem produksi.
Kualifikasi:
- Pendidikan: Minimal S1 di bidang Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Elektro, Matematika, atau bidang terkait.
- Pengalaman: Minimal 1 tahun pengalaman sebagai AI Engineer atau dalam pengembangan model computer vision.
Keahlian Teknis:
- Menguasai bahasa pemrograman Python dan pustaka terkait seperti TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, dan scikit-learn.
- Pemahaman mendalam tentang arsitektur CNN, RNN, dan transformer untuk visi komputer.
- Pengalaman dengan pengolahan data dalam skala besar dan pemrosesan paralel.
Keahlian Tambahan:
- Pengalaman dengan framework deployment seperti TensorFlow Serving, ONNX, atau model server lainnya.
- Pengalaman dalam pengembangan aplikasi berbasis AI di cloud (AWS, GCP, atau Azure).
Soft Skills:
- Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim.
- Kreatif dalam memecahkan masalah dan proaktif dalam mencari solusi.

title: Data Scientist
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan Data Scientist PT. Hypefast Karya Nusantara
Lead end-to-end deployment of advanced analytics pipeline, collaborating with product managers, data engineering, or backend engineer team
Translating business needs to data science problems, and performing experiments to validate the hypothesis
Develop machine learning models (ML)/advanced analytics algorithms using state-of-the-art methods
Design analytics framework (ML and statistical model) for various use cases
Maintain the quality and execution of the analytics models for various products
Perform periodic review on the implementation of the model and data pipeline
Collaborate with analytics team to advice on the usage of Hypefast data asset to solve business problems
Perform exploratory data analysis on various data sources to get new insights to improve and give recommendation for new product development or online experimentation
Discuss and align with stakeholders on key product metrics, design and propose experimentation strategies
Launch A/B tests, analyze experiment results and provide recommendations

title: Data Scientist
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan Data Scientist Dnalytics Consulting
We are looking Energetic Candidate with :
Bachelor of Engineering (Computer / Telecommunication), Computer Science / Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics or equivalent.
Have at least 3 year of experience in the appropriate field for this position
Mastering Python and R.
Understand Machine Learning is a must.
Understand the concept of Data Mining well.
Understanding the concept of OLAP an having experince in designing DWH and Datamart
Experienes as a DBA will be an advantage
Good Team work with the team.
Can translate and understand scientific papers or jurals.
Able to work under pressure.
Have good communication skills (oral and written)
Able to speak English well (oral and written).
Have the ability to solve problems.
Honest, responsible and have a good work ethic.
The roles and responsibilities for this position are:
Presentation Skill of technology products related to data (Data Warehouse, Data Analytics, and Data Visualization)
Responsible to Create reports and documentation of customer case analysis
Capable to do data retrieval and pre-processing from various sources
Understand how to make business case analysis and how to utilize enterprise level data for business insight and give value for the company and for the client.
Develop business and machine-learning model from data owned by the company and / or client.

title: Data Scientist
location: Tanjung Priok, Jakarta Utara, DKI Jakarta
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan Data Scientist Pt Uniair Indotama Cargo
About The Role :
Planning and executing projects, following through the entire software development lifecycle.
Collaboratively work with internal stakeholder, project team members and partners in defining business & technical requirements and specifications.
Work with the project team to translate requirements into project deliverables & prioritization.
Develop and implement machine learning models to solve business problems.
Lead functional discussions and leverage your knowledge of best practices
perform project Researche & Development Releted to AI/ML.
What we are looking for:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
At least 2 years of experience in the area of Data Science or related roles.
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python and SQL.
Familiarity with Machine Learning frameworks like Deep Learning, Tensor Flow, Pytorch, and Generative AI.
Hands-on and successful project delivery experience related to artificial intelligence or machine learning.
Experience with cloud platforms Alibaba, AWS, GCP, Azure, or similar platforms.
Self-motivated with a passion for continuous learning in the rapidly evolving field of AI/ML

title: Data Scientist
location: Pasar Minggu, Jakarta Selatan, DKI Jakarta
description:
Deskripsi pekerjaan Data Scientist PT Suitmedia Kreasi Indonesia
Role:
You will deliver actionable insights and predictive models to solve business problems.
Responsibilities:
- Analyse structured and unstructured data to identify trends and patterns.
- Build and validate machine learning models (classification, regression, clustering, etc.).
- Communicate findings through reports and visualizations.
- Collaborate with business teams to define problem statements and success metrics.
- Deploy models and monitor performance in production environments (if needed).
Qualifications:
- Minimum 3 years experience in data scientist
- Proficiency in Python or R, with libraries like scikit-learn, pandas, NumPy, etc.
- Experience with ML lifecycle: data prep, modelling, evaluation, and deployment.
- Familiarity with cloud ML platforms (AWS SageMaker).
- Strong statistical and analytical thinking.
- Bonus: Experience with Model Deployment
This position is prioritized for Jakarta office.
